name: Swarm (Beta)
description:
SwarmDescription

Swarm is a tower defense game with fast pace player input that will put your reaction skills to the test!

Survive through the hordes of enemies to reach the boss, then defeat it to clear the stages and survive the swarm!

This game is currently in development and the plan features are listed below. If you would like updates on this game visit the developer blog, and thank you to any donations your help is greatly appreciated!

Planned Features
  • Rouge-Like progression of the stages
  • Purchase upgrades in order to beat the increasing difficulty
  • More complex enemies to defeat
  • More challenging boss fights
  • Improved endless stage
  • More music
  • Leader-boards
  • Achievements

Visit Lazydevstudio.com for more information about the development. And let me know what you think of the game in the comment section below!
